name: omReadings
description: Provides a list of available meterrs in the OpenMETER project ( https://www.openmeter.de/ ) which grants access for analytics as data discovery.

$ul: **currentScalingFactor**: Factor imposed on metered current by a transducer
**loadProfileType**: Metering load profile type associated with the meter
**location**: Basic address information for geo coding
**measurementType**: Physical quantity being measured by the meter
**meterId**: identifier to be used in other methods like readings or activities.
**scalingFactor**: Factor imposed on metered current AND voltage by a transducer
**voltageScalingFactor**: Factor imposed on metered voltage by a transducer
